animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm known for enjoying a specific type of nut.
💧 I use my nose to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with string.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 My favourite food is acacia leaves

animal.question: I croak and jump, and love to eat flies. Who am I?

hints.text: 👅 I have a long, sticky tongue

animal.question: I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I swim in the ocean and have sharp teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I can sense blood from far away.

animal.question: I carry my house on my back. Who am I?
I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 Each of us has a unique stripe pattern.
🐎 I look a bit like a horse.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal hunter known for my silent flight. Who am I?
I am a marsupial that hops and carries its young in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥊 I am known for boxing with my feet
👶 I carry my baby, called a Joey.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I'm very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You might find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and salty too. Ships sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squirt ink to get away. What am I?
I'm a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and has a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I breathe air through a hole on my head.
🐳 Some of my species are very big.

ocean.question: I am a fish that looks like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 Male species of me carry their young.
🐠 I am a small fish that swims upright.

ocean.question: I’m a giant underwater mountain, but most of me is hidden. What am I?

hints.text: 🗻 I am formed by tectonic plates.
🌎 I am a landform below the ocean.

ocean.question: I’m a group of tiny sea creatures that glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🔬 You need a microscope to see some of me.
🌃 I can make the ocean light up at night.

ocean.question: I am a large opening in the earth on the seafloor that releases heat. What am I?

hints.text: ♨️ I can support life even in the dark depths.
💨 I release heated water into the ocean.
🕳️ I am often found near volcanically active places.

ocean.question: I am a powerful current in the Atlantic Ocean that brings warm water towards Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I affect the climate of Western Europe.
➡️ I am like a river in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a measurement of how much salt is in the water of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🧂 Too much of me can be bad for some sea creatures.
🌊 I am higher in some oceans than others.
⚖️ I am often measured in parts per thousand.
